about.p1: Coinos is an open source bitcoin payment app. Development started in Vancouver in September 2012 as a way to provide local merchants with a convenient way to accept bitcoin payments.
about.p2: You can download the source code to run an instance and connect it to your own bitcoin and lightning nodes. We'll help you get started being a benevolent custodian and payments provider for your community.
about.p3: Account transfers amongst users on our server are done off-chain so they're completely free, instant, and unlimited.

adam.name: Adam Soltys
adam.bio: Adam is a web developer and bitcoin enthusiast who believes sound money is key to increasing global prosperity. He lives in North Vancouver with his wife Chelsea and two children.

secondl1ght.name: secondl1ght
secondl1ght.bio: A self-taught Web Developer, secondl1ght dove head first down the bitcoin rabbit hole and left his fiat job to focus on bitcoin development full-time. He contributes to open source projects, is a privacy advocate, and freedom lover.

gene.name: Gene
gene.bio: My mission is to help startup founders succeed. I create products to achieve this goal. Pixel-perfect product design. Get it shipped.

shauna.name: Shauna
shauna.bio: Strategic & Project Management. Jack of all Trades. Can always find time to meet for coffee.

cole.name: Cole
cole.bio: As a Certified Bitcoin Professional, Cole is a driven individual with a passion for freedom. He came across bitcoin in 2016 and studied it in depth. Now he wants to introduce the lightning network to as many users as possible.

john.name: John Barratt
john.bio: When not coding you can find John out in the woods hiking all the great trails that BC has to offer.

locations.description: Here are some businesses that are accepting bitcoin with Coinos. We hope that yours will be next!

error.message: Please try again or contact support.

cost.question: What does it cost?
cost.answer: It's free to register an account and receive payments over the lightning network. We charge a 0.1% fee to convert from lightning to bitcoin.

compatibility.question: Do I need any special device or software?
compatibility.answer: No. Coinos is web-based, so as long as you have an internet connection, you can use it on any device. Retail merchants might use it on a phone or a tablet.

safety.question: When do my funds settle?
safety.answer: Lightning payments are settled instantly. You can withdraw your balance to another wallet or exchange right after payments are received.

step1.description: A username and password is all you need to get started.

step2.description: The same as you normally would, but with bitcoin.

step3.description: Spend your coin at other merchants or save it for a rainy day, the choice is yours.

jobs.pitch1: Coinos is actively looking for developers to join our growing team (full-time or part-time, remote working OK).
jobs.pitch2: Excited about working on open source bitcoin? Then take a look at our repositories on
jobs.pitch3: If you think you can make an impact, we'd love to hear from you. Send us your resume to

landing.header_after_icon: way to accept bitcoin in your store.
landing.subheader: Grow your customer base and revenue by accepting bitcoin with an easy-to-use web app. No software or hardware required.

info1.title: Instant payments via Lightning
info1.description: The moment your customer sends a payment, it’s there. No waiting for bank settlements or worrying about chargebacks. Instant settlement, in seconds. Say goodbye to 3% credit card processing fees.

info2.title: Simple to use
info2.description1: Just enter an amount in your local currency, share the QR code and you’re done.
info2.description2: We do all the heavy lifting so you can focus on your business.
info2.description3: You always have the option of taking custody of your funds by withdrawing instantly at any time.

info3.title: Brand it your way!
info3.description: Customize your point of sale look and feel, or keep it on default - it's totally up to you.

login.passwordRecommendation: We recommend a long, random password generated with a password manager.

newSiteHeader: Join us at our launch party in Vancouver on October 26! Looking for the old coinos? Visit classic.coinos.io

user.likeAnEmail: is like an email for bitcoin. You can publish it on your website or business cards and use it multiple times.

dashboard.conversionFeeWarning: You will be charged a 1% withdrawal fee on the amount.

receive.lessThan1BTCWarning: Please enter an amount less than 1 bitcoin.

send.placeholder: Paste a bitcoin address, lightning invoice or coinos username

settings.emailNotificationsDescription: Get notified via email when a change occurs on your account or when people send you payments.
settings.smsNotificationsDescription: Coinos will send you text notifications when this is enabled.
settings.themeDescription: Select from the default color themes.
settings.securityPINDescription: Set a security pin that will be used to unlock your settings and to send outgoing payments.
settings.autoLockDescription: Your account will go into a secure mode automatically after a specified time:
settings.twofaDescription: Add an extra level of security to your device by enableing 2-factor authentication.

transactions.describeOrder: Use this field to describe your order
